h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Golden Lining Location
content: The Loong Scales can be found by defeating the First Prince of Flowing Sands in Yellow Wind Ridge. The boss is located underneath the arena where you fight the King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince") upon throwing the Pungent Flesh Chunk off the cliff. Get the boss to destroy the mural wall in the arena, or use a powerful Transformation ability and head through to pick up the Key Item.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Golden_Lining.md', within the main section titled 'Golden Lining', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Golden Lining Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Loong Scales can be found by defeating the First Prince of Flowing Sands in Yellow Wind Ridge. The boss is located underneath the arena where you fight the King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince") upon throwing the Pungent Flesh Chunk off the cliff. Get the boss to destroy the mural wall in the arena, or use a powerful Transformation ability and head through to pick up the Key Item.
